title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
Wyrm's Crossing, on the outskirts of Baldur's Gate. We should keep an eye out for Mizora. Mizora gifted Wyll an infernal rapier for his troubles, though she required some convincing.

Attend Gortash's ordination ceremony.

We found Mizora at Wyrm's Rock fortress. She insisted we attend Gortash's ordination and seek her out afterwards.

Return to Mizora.

The ceremony is over. We should return to Mizora.
